page.title: 15GAME KEEPING
page.content: The larger local farmers employ game keepers.A trainee gamekeeper works a 40 hr week,and sometimes starts at 7.00 am and doesn't finish until 10pm. As the balance of nature has been destoyed by man because of the spraying of pesticides and removing of hedgerows,his job is to restore that balance by reducing numbers of wildlife where necessary.He often walks 5-6 mile per day to catch rats,weasels,stoats,foxes,squirrels and rabbits. He also breeds pheasants and partridge for the shooting season and protects them from bad weather and pesticides.He also protects crops from pests by using bangers to scare them off.Unfortunately some get used to it.
